gobblin.metastore

Interface StateStore<T extends State>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - state object type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatasetStateStore<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FsStateStore, MysqlStateStore

    public interface StateStore<T extends State>
    An interface for stores that persist States.

    Each such store consists of zero or more tables, and each table stores zero or more States keyed on the state IDs (see State.getId()).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Method Detail

      • create

        boolean create(String storeName)
        throws IOException
        Create a new store.

        A store that does not exist will be created when any put method is called against it.

        Parameters:
        storeName - store name
        Returns:
        if the store is successfully created
        Throws:
        IOException

      • put

        void put(String storeName,
         String tableName,
         T state)
  throws IOException
        Put a State into a table.

        Calling this method against a store or a table that does not exist will cause it to be created.

        Parameters:
        storeName - store name
        tableName - table name
        state - State to be put into the table
        Throws:
        IOException
